content:
:tada: http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/sdc/STU3/index.html :tada:
Thanks to everyone who's been involved in making this happen!
https://hl7.org/fhir/us/sdc/ (note the "us" instead of "uv") still points to 2.0. Will that be redirected?
@Grahame Grieve @Lynn Laakso?
Sorry didn't send out the announcement since I'm waiting for the last step in the publication process to transition the issues through workflow
It's not an announcement question, it's updating the 'old' US SDC to stay in sync with the new UV SDC
Congratulations to all of the hard-working people who spent days, weeks, months and years on the SDC IG!

Paul Lynch said:

https://hl7.org/fhir/us/sdc/ (note the "us" instead of "uv") still points to 2.0. Will that be redirected?

Are there any updates on this? When I search using Google for "fhir sdc", that old version is what comes up, and there is no indication that it isn't the current version.
